public static void solve(Scanner scanner, StringBuilder stringBuilder) { 

    int m = scanner.nextInt(); 

    int[] p = new int[m]; 

    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) 

        p[i] = scanner.nextInt(); 

    // Initialize the current level's data 

    int level = 0; 

    int currentLength = m; 

    // We'll use an array of objects for each position's data 

    // Each element is an array [min, max, swaps, possible] 

    int[][] current = new int[currentLength][4]; 

    for (int i = 0; i < currentLength; i++) { 

        current[i][0] = p[i]; // min 

        current[i][1] = p[i]; // max 

        current[i][2] = 0; // swaps 

        current[i][3] = 1; // possible 

    } 

    while (currentLength > 1) { 

        int nextLength = currentLength / 2; 

        int[][] next = new int[nextLength][4]; 

        for (int i = 0; i < nextLength; i++) { 

            int leftIndex = 2*i; 

            int rightIndex = 2*i +1; 

            int[] left = current[leftIndex]; 

            int[] right = current[rightIndex]; 

            boolean leftPossible = left[3] == 1; 

            boolean rightPossible = right[3] == 1; 

            if (!leftPossible || !rightPossible) { 

                next[i][3] = 0; 

                continue; 

            } 

            // Option 1: no swap 

            boolean option1Possible = (left[1] +1 == right[0]); 

            int option1Swaps = left[2] + right[2]; 

            int option1Min = left[0]; 

            int option1Max = right[1]; 

            // Option 2: swap 

            boolean option2Possible = (right[1] +1 == left[0]); 

            int option2Swaps = left[2] + right[2] +1; 

            int option2Min = right[0]; 

            int option2Max = left[1]; 

            // Determine best option 

            boolean possible = false; 

            int minSwaps = Integer.MAX_VALUE; 

            int min = 0; 

            int max = 0; 

            if (option1Possible) { 

                possible = true; 

                if (option1Swaps < minSwaps) { 

                    minSwaps = option1Swaps; 

                    min = option1Min; 

                    max = option1Max; 

                } 

            } 

            if (option2Possible) { 

                possible = true; 

                if (option2Swaps < minSwaps) { 

                    minSwaps = option2Swaps; 

                    min = option2Min; 

                    max = option2Max; 

                } 

            } 

            if (possible) { 

                next[i][0] = min; 

                next[i][1] = max; 

                next[i][2] = minSwaps; 

                next[i][3] = 1; 

            } else { 

                next[i][3] = 0; 

            } 

        } 

        current = next; 

        currentLength = nextLength; 

    } 

    if (current[0][3] == 0) { 

        stringBuilder.append(-1).append('\n'); 

    } else { 

        stringBuilder.append(current[0][2]).append('\n'); 

    } 

}
